mapper.select:
select
from urine_test_info where is_deleted = 'N'
and name like '%${name}%'
and bottleb like '%${bottleb}%'
order by create_time desc

select count(*) from urine_test_info where is_deleted = 'N'
and name like '%${name}%'
and bottleb like '%${bottleb}%'
order by create_time desc

select
from urine_test_info where is_deleted = 'N' and is_dealed = 'N' and SYSDATE() > bottle_deadtimeB
mapper.update: update urine_test_info set is_dealed = 'Y', update_user='${updateUser}', update_time=sysdate() where ID = ${id}
